Class Chart

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Utility class for dealing with text and numbers parsed from the chart

      static String addWhitespaceIfRequired(double currXDir, double prevXDir, double prevWidthDirAdj)
      Adds a space or a tab marker (using a pipe character) when the positions of two characters suggests it.
      static String convertToText(List<ChartCharacter> line)
      Converts the list of ChartCharacters into a String, including inserting space, pipe, and new line characters when the horizontal and vertical positions of adjacent characters suggests it

      • round

        public static BigDecimal round(double d,
                               int newScale)
        Round half-up and up to the defined numer of decimal places. Used to try to avoid floating point woes

      • convertToText

        public static String convertToText(List<ChartCharacter> line)
        Converts the list of ChartCharacters into a String, including inserting space, pipe, and new line characters when the horizontal and vertical positions of adjacent characters suggests it

      • addWhitespaceIfRequired

        public static String addWhitespaceIfRequired(double currXDir,
                                             double prevXDir,
                                             double prevWidthDirAdj)
        Adds a space or a tab marker (using a pipe character) when the positions of two characters suggests it. Otherwise returns an empty String
